text: Bernat Pomar (Palma, 1932-2011) was a Mallorcan composer and violinist.Doreen Carvajal The Forgetting River 2012 His best known work is the Suite de danses de Mallorca. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2011 deaths Category:Spanish violinists Category:Male violinists Category:People from Palma de Mallorca Category:Spanish composers Category:Spanish male composers Category:20th-century violinists Category:20th-century Spanish musicians Category:20th-century male musicians
title: Bernat Pomar
